## Description {#details}

This file is part of the WebAssembly Assembler.

It contains code to translate a parsed .s file into MCInsts.

<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyasmtypecheck/#a3d3c6861d8429320494c70c05a02dc81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyasmtypecheck/#a3d3c6861d8429320494c70c05a02dc81">clear</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Stack.clear();</span></CodeLine>
